mean_cn: n. 轻微暗示，小提示，略知
mean_en: a slight, uncertain idea about something :a slight amount of knowledge about something
short_phrase: have an inkling that he has another girlfriend
sentence: I'm not sure if he's cheating on me, but I'm getting an inkling that he has another girlfriend.
sentence_trans: 我不太确定他有没有劈腿，但是我隐约感觉到他有其他女朋友。
